backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no methods or state defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report file with an empty features list, indicating no features have been tracked yet.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of three frontend files: App.tsx (profile picture manager), index.css (color palette and dark mode), and tailwind.config.js (Tailwind customizations).
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color tokens including sidebar, chart, and semantic UI colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Clarification needed â€“ incomplete request' that mounts the React app via a root div and loads main.tsx as a module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Profile picture manager React component supporting drag-and-drop upload, circular avatar preview, and change/download/remove actions using client-side object URLs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context, provider, and hook for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout state and identity with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Inter font and defining a warm-neutral OKLCH color palette with full light and dark mode CSS custom property tokens for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering into the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with Inter font, OKLCH color tokens, custom border radii, accordion keyframe animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file indicating a new, unnamed project in clarification mode with no existing features, issues, or architectural notes recorded.
